fields.name: initialDate
fields.desc: The initially selected [DateTime] that the picker should display.

fields.name: firstDate
fields.desc: The earliest allowable [DateTime] that the user can select.

fields.name: lastDate
fields.desc: The latest allowable [DateTime] that the user can select.

fields.name: currentDate
fields.desc: The [DateTime] representing today. It will be highlighted in the day grid.

fields.name: initialEntryMode
fields.desc: The initial mode of date entry method for the date picker dialog.

fields.name: selectableDayPredicate
fields.desc: Function to provide full control over which [DateTime] can be selected.

fields.name: cancelText
fields.desc: The text that is displayed on the cancel button.

fields.name: confirmText
fields.desc: The text that is displayed on the confirm button.

fields.name: helpText
fields.desc: The text that is displayed at the top of the header.

fields.name: initialCalendarMode
fields.desc: The initial display of the calendar picker.

fields.name: errorFormatText
fields.desc: The error text displayed if the entered date is not in the correct format.

fields.name: errorInvalidText
fields.desc: The error text displayed if the date is not valid.

fields.name: fieldHintText
fields.desc: The hint text displayed in the [TextField].

fields.name: fieldLabelText
fields.desc: The label text displayed in the [TextField].

fields.name: keyboardType
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.datePickerDialog} The keyboard type of the [TextField].

fields.name: restorationId
fields.desc: Restoration ID to save and restore the state of the [DatePickerDialog].

fields.name: onDatePickerModeChange
fields.desc: Called when the [DatePickerDialog] is toggled between [DatePickerEntryMode.calendar],[DatePickerEntryMode.input].

fields.name: switchToInputEntryModeIcon
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.date_picker.switchToInputEntryModeIcon}

fields.name: switchToCalendarEntryModeIcon
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.date_picker.switchToCalendarEntryModeIcon}

fields.name: insetPadding
fields.desc: The amount of padding added to [MediaQueryData.viewInsets] on the outside of the dialog. This defines the minimum space between the screen's edges and the dialog.

fields.name: calendarDelegate
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.calendar_date_picker.calendarDelegate}
